short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Convert speech to text and input it into focused text fields.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Speechie - Voice-Controlled Text Input

Transform your browsing experience with Speechie. This extension converts your spoken words into text and inputs it directly into any focused text field. Enjoy hands-free text entry with accurate speech-to-text conversion and simple voice commands for tasks like opening new tabs and refreshing pages. Ideal for a more efficient and convenient browsing experience.

Version: 1.1.0
